characters: Driver of a red truck, driver of a white sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A red truck is ahead in the same lane, and a white sedan is on the left side, attempting to merge into the lane. The truck is moving slowly, and the white sedan is gradually moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the red truck ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the white sedan on the left side, which is attempting to merge into the lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A red truck, approximately 10 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, attempting to merge into the lane.
